statements: SELECT * FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees;
SELECT member_id, fee_amount FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees WHERE fee_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_date, fee_amount, payment_method FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT member_id, fee_amount FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT member_id, fee_amount, payment_date FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT AVG(fee_amount) AS average_fee, MAX(fee_amount) AS max_fee FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees;
SELECT member_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees GROUP BY member_id HAVING total_payments > 3;
SELECT * FROM MembershipSystem.MembershipFees WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND fee_amount < 50 ORDER BY member_id ASC, payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM membership_fees
SELECT membership_id, member_name FROM membership_fees ORDER BY membership_id DESC
SELECT * FROM membership_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100
SELECT membership_id, fee_amount, payment_date FROM membership_fees WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT package_id, package_name, package_price FROM class_packages ORDER BY package_price ASC
SELECT * FROM membership_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, fee_amount FROM membership_fees WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM class_packages WHERE package_price > 50 ORDER BY package_name ASC;
SELECT package_name, class_schedule FROM class_packages WHERE package_price BETWEEN 30 AND 100;
SELECT member_name, fee_amount, payment_date FROM membership_fees WHERE fee_amount < 50 AND payment_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM membership_fees ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT amount, payment_date FROM membership_fees WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM class_packages ORDER BY package_name DESC;
SELECT id, price FROM class_packages WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT member_id, payment_date, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM membership_fees ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, member_id, amount, DATE_FORMAT(payment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM membership_fees WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT package_name, CONCAT('$', price), LEFT(description, 20) AS short_description FROM class_packages WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY package_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY member_id HAVING total_amount_paid > 500;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Membership WHERE membership_type = 'Gold'
SELECT member_name, email FROM Membership ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT member_name, email, start_date FROM Membership WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT package_name, price FROM ClassPackage WHERE duration >= 10 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT session_id, session_date FROM ClassSession WHERE capacity > 20
SELECT * FROM Membership WHERE membership_type = 'Premium'
SELECT member_name, email FROM Membership WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ClassPackage WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM Payment WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT session_date, session_duration FROM ClassSession WHERE capacity > 10 AND session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY session_date
SELECT * FROM membership ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, last_payment_date FROM membership;
SELECT package_name, price FROM class_package WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM payment WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT class_id, member_id, package_id, class_date FROM member_class ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, last_payment_date FROM membership WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, member_id, package_id, class_date FROM member_class ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT package_name, price FROM class_package WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY package_name ASC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment WHERE amount >= 50 AND payment_date < '2022-06-01';
